page.title: 11Blockley schools
page.content: The children of Blockley School mainly come from Blockley. They also come from Aston Magna, Draycott, Paxford, Snowshill and Springhill. The children are aged from four to eleven.When they are eleven they move to Campden Comprehensive school. The original school is small compared with other schools. Mr Walsh is pleased to have a new school built because there were a lot of problems being on split sites. Mr Walsh, the headmaster also teaches.He teaches 2nd 3rd and 4th year juniours. Mr Walsh teaches 50%of his time. When the new school is built he will be spending a lot more of his time teaching.When he is not teaching a part time teacher called Mrs Ephgrave teaches the class. The adevantages of teaching in Blockley are mainly the children
